pages.text: 56|51|Sonotoki anata gata wa (dodearou), mayotte (shinri o) kyogidearu to shita mono yo.
56|52|Kanarazu anata gata wa zakkumu no ki (no mi) o tabe,
56|53|sorede hara wa ippai.
56|54|Sono Ue nietatsu yu o nomu,
56|55|nodo ga kawaita rakuda ga nomu yo ni.
56|56|Korega-shinki no hi no, kare-ra no motenashidearu.
56|57|Ware wa anata gata o tsukutta. Anata gata wa doshite shinjitsu o shinjiyou to shinai no ka.
56|58|Anata gata wa, anata gata no shashutsu suru mono (seieki) ni tsuite kangaeta ka.
56|59|Sore o tsukutta no wa anata gatana no ka, soretomo ware ga sono sozo-shadearu no ka.
56|60|Ware wa, anata gata ni shi (ki) o sadameta. Ware wa,(kesshite) dashinuka re tari suru koto wanai.
56|61|Daga ware wa dorui no mono de torikae (sedai no kotai), matawa anata gataga shiranai (hoka no keitai no) mono ni, anata gata o So (ri kae)ru.
56|62|Anata gata wa, tashikani saisho no sozo o shitte iru. Soredemo naze ryui shinai no ka.
56|63|Anata gata wa, anata gata ga tagayasu (hata no) koto o kangaeta ka.
56|64|Anata gataga sore (shokubutsu) o sodateru no ka, soretomo ware ga sodateru no ka.
56|65|Moshi ware ga hossurunaraba, sore o kareta kuzu ni shite shimau. Anata gata wa kyogaku shite yamanai.
56|66|(Soshite iudearou. ) `Watashi-tachi wa hontoni fusai o kase rareta.
56|67|Iya, watashi-tachi wa (rodo no seika o) toriage rareta.'
56|68|Mata anata gata no nomu mizu ni tsuite kangaeta ka.
56|69|Anata gataga kumo kara (ame o) furaseru no ka, soretomo ware ga furaseru no ka.
56|70|Ware ga moshi hossurunaraba, sore o shiokaraku suru koto ga dekiru. Anata gata wa doshite kansha shinai no ka.
56|71|Anata gata wa, tomoshibi ni tsuite kangaeta ka.
56|72|Sono (moyasu) ki o, anata gata ga tsukutta no ka, soretomo ware ga tsukutta no ka.
56|73|Ware wa sore o kyokun to shi, mata koya no jumin no benri no tame ni tsukutta.
56|74|Dakara idaide ara reru anata no omo no gyomei o tatae nasai.
56|75|Watashi wa, shizunde yuku hoshi ni kakete chikau.
56|76|Sore wa hontoni idaina chikaidearu. Moshi anata gata ni wakarunaraba,
